rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming entrance with sufficient light and space for storage.

rooms.name: Living Area
rooms.description: An open-plan living area adjoining the kitchen, designed for comfort and interaction.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Open-concept kitchen integrated with the living area, equipped with modern amenities while following Vastu guidelines of positioning for energy flow.

rooms.name: Library
rooms.description: A dedicated library space offering quiet and solitude, positioned as per Vastu for knowledge and learning. Incorporates storage for books and reading chairs.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious bedroom with ample light, designed according to Vastu principles for positive energy.

rooms.name: Servant Quarters
rooms.description: Private and comfortable quarters for the staff, positioned in a way that respects privacy while adhering to building norms.

openings.description: Multiple windows throughout to ensure proper ventilation and natural lighting as per Vastu.
